document_data.name: Zastra
document_data.mainbody: stra had dark skin and shoulder-length black hair. She wore a set of [[leather armor]], and used her fists to fight instead of any weapon.
document_data.Description: Zastra had dark skin and shoulder-length black hair. She wore a set of [[leather armor]], and used her fists to fight instead of any weapon.
document_data.Personality: Zastra was fiercely (or perhaps desperately) defensive of what little she had in the prison, and refused to let any of it be lost.
